languages.text: {n}Нагрудник Соломона пробит в нескольких местах, а лицо залито кровью, но взгляд проктора ясен и тверд.{/n} "Живы, Вольный Торговец? Отлично".
{n}Solomorne's chestplate is punctured in multiple places and his face stained with blood, but his gaze remains clear and firm.{/n} "Still alive, Rogue Trader? Good."
languages.original_text: {n}Нагрудник Соломона пробит в нескольких местах, а лицо залито кровью, но взгляд проктора ясен и тверд.{/n} "Живы, Вольный Торговец? Отлично".

{n}Solomorne's chestplate is punctured in multiple places and his face stained with blood, but his gaze remains clear and firm.{/n} "Still alive, Rogue Trader? Good."

languages.text: {n}Solomornes Brustplatte ist völlig durchlöchert und sein Gesicht ist blutverschmiert, aber sein Blick ist noch immer klar und standhaft.{/n} "Ihr lebt noch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Gut."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's chestplate is punctured in multiple places and his face stained with blood, but his gaze remains clear and firm.{/n} "Still alive, Rogue Trader? Good."

traits.locale_text: "Solomornes Brustplatte ist völlig durchlöchert und sein Gesicht ist blutverschmiert, aber sein Blick ist noch immer klar und standhaft.{/n} "Ihr lebt noch, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}? Gut."

languages.text: {n}La cuirasse de Solomorne est percée d'impacts en plusieurs endroits et son visage est maculé de sang, mais son regard n'a rien perdu de sa détermination.{/n} « Toujours de ce monde, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Parfait. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's chestplate is punctured in multiple places and his face stained with blood, but his gaze remains clear and firm.{/n} "Still alive, Rogue Trader? Good."

traits.locale_text: {n}La cuirasse de Solomorne est percée d'impacts en plusieurs endroits et son visage est maculé de sang, mais son regard n'a rien perdu de sa détermination.{/n} « Toujours de ce monde, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ? Parfait. »

languages.text: {n}La coraza de Solomorne ha sido perforada en varios puntos y su rostro está ensangrentado, pero su expresión no ha perdido un ápice de firmeza.{/n} «¿Aún vive, Comerciante Independiente? Bien».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's chestplate is punctured in multiple places and his face stained with blood, but his gaze remains clear and firm.{/n} "Still alive, Rogue Trader? Good."

traits.locale_text: {n}La coraza de Solomorne ha sido perforada en varios puntos y su rostro está ensangrentado, pero su expresión no ha perdido un ápice de firmeza.{/n} «¿Aún vive, Comerciante Independiente? Bien».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙的胸甲多处被刺穿，脸上也血迹斑斑，但他的目光依然清晰、坚定。{/n}“你还活着，行商浪人？那就好。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's chestplate is punctured in multiple places and his face stained with blood, but his gaze remains clear and firm.{/n} "Still alive, Rogue Trader? Good."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙的胸甲多处被刺穿，脸上也血迹斑斑，但他的目光依然清晰、坚定。{/n}“你还活着，行商浪人？那就好。”

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンの胸当てにはいくつもの穴が空き、顔には血がこびりついていた。それでも彼の眼差しはなおも澄み切り、揺るぎないままだった。{/n}「まだ生きていましたか、ローグトレーダー。よかった」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's chestplate is punctured in multiple places and his face stained with blood, but his gaze remains clear and firm.{/n} "Still alive, Rogue Trader? Good."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンの胸当てにはいくつもの穴が空き、顔には血がこびりついていた。それでも彼の眼差しはなおも澄み切り、揺るぎないままだった。{/n}「まだ生きていましたか、ローグトレーダー。よかった」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne'un göğüs plakası delik deşik olmuş, suratı kana bulanmış olsa da bakışlarındaki sertlik ve keskinlik hâlâ varlığını koruyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, hâlâ hayattasınız. Güzel."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne's chestplate is punctured in multiple places and his face stained with blood, but his gaze remains clear and firm.{/n} "Still alive, Rogue Trader? Good."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne'un göğüs plakası delik deşik olmuş, suratı kana bulanmış olsa da bakışlarındaki sertlik ve keskinlik hâlâ varlığını koruyor.{/n} "Hür Tacir, hâlâ hayattasınız. Güzel."
